item.title: CVE-2024-31287|2024-08-02T01:46:05.019Z -- max%20foundry -- media%20library%20folders
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Max Foundry Media Library Folders.This issue affects Media Library Folders: from n/a through 8.1.8.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Max Foundry Media Library Folders.This issue affects Media Library Folders: from n/a through 8.1.7.
